channel.title: Looking for some (probably) simple help
channel.description:
2 years ago, I had my own 2 up and running servers, but the the thing that differs then from now, is that those servers were only on moparscape. People just had to go onto the client and type in my info, and connect to it. But now, I want to have my own client, and I've gone through the forums serveral times and can't seem to find the proper help. I've gone through and downloaded several of the sources and clients provided for everyone to use, but there are still 2 things I'm confused about.
1 - How do I turn that client into something that others can download, and connect right to me. I feel like if I just turn around and send the client to someone without changing something, it obviously won't connect to my server if they push run.
2 - What is it that I have to change to make the client automatically connect to my server. My ports and everything are forwarded. I'm all set on that stuff.
Thanks in advance for any help.

item.title: Looking for some (probably) simple help
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“free wayne, post:8, topic:354464”]well, I’ve heard that it was GUI.java, which one is it?

And how do I upload the client so that when people download it, it doesn’t have tons of crap in the folder, it looks really messy.[/quote]

client class = client.java

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for some (probably) simple help
item.dc:creator: @free_wayne free wayne
item.description:
@free_wayne wrote:

could I possibly have a quick chat with one of you somehow? if not I’ll just ask here.

When you say go into the " Client Class ", do you mean Client.class? because if so i’m not sure how to edit that

item.title: Looking for some (probably) simple help
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

free wayne:

So just replace 127.0.0.1 with the example “host.no-ip.org” thing that people would have to type in to connect to me?

Pretty much, once you’re done that complie it, should work then.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for some (probably) simple help
item.dc:creator: @magekid990 magekid990
item.description:

yes, or you could just make it built in so when they open in it all they have to do is type user and pass and login

item.title: Looking for some (probably) simple help
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

You mean changing your clients IP? That’s usually handled in your clients “Client class” just search for 127.0.0.1 in client class, simply change it your no-ip it should connect then.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for some (probably) simple help
item.dc:creator: @free_wayne free wayne
item.description:
@free_wayne wrote:

2 years ago, I had my own 2 up and running servers, but the the thing that differs then from now, is that those servers were only on moparscape. People just had to go onto the client and type in my info, and connect to it. But now, I want to have my own client, and I’ve gone through the forums serveral times and can’t seem to find the proper help. I’ve gone through and downloaded several of the sources and clients provided for everyone to use, but there are still 2 things I’m confused about.

1 - How do I turn that client into something that others can download, and connect right to me. I feel like if I just turn around and send the client to someone without changing something, it obviously won’t connect to my server if they push run.

2 - What is it that I have to change to make the client automatically connect to my server. My ports and everything are forwarded. I’m all set on that stuff.

Thanks in advance for any help.
